post:
We've got some great deals for you LowEndTalk, this time in some different locations! We've recently added Miami, Florida to our growing list of US based locations, perfect for our friends in South America who wish to have a better connection to their homes. We're happy to be running our first promotion available in our Florida location! In a place less sunny than Florida (The UK) we've reintroduced new stock in Maidenhead. In our previous promotions we did not list Maidenhead, UK as an option due to insufficient stock but we're happy to offer it to you once more. And because Los Angeles continues to be one of our most popular VPS locations, we'll offer it as part of this promotion as well!

<h1>Look at these deals!</h1>

Look at what $30/YR will get you, now that's a heck of a deal.

• 1536MB RAM // 1536MB Burst
• 45GB Disk Space
• 1 IPv4 Address
• 500GB Bandwidth
• 100Mbps Port
• OpenVZ/SolusVM
• Price: <b>$30/YR</b> (after coupon)
• Coupon Code: LETMAR2013

<b>Location Choices (choose in order form):</b>
• Maidenhead, UK
• Miami, FL
• Los Angeles, CA

<h2>[<a href="https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=241&promocode=LETMAR2013">Order Now</a>]</h2>

<p align="center"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/hgwOXpA.jpg" /></p>

Due to the success of our recent $6.95/mo for 2GB RAM deal, we've decided to continue offering it as an ongoing LET/LEB promotion.

• 2048MB RAM // 2048MB Burst
• 50GB Disk Space
• 1 IPv4 Address
• 750GB Bandwidth
• 100Mbps Port
• OpenVZ/SolusVM
• Price: <b>$6.95/mo</b> (after coupon)
• Coupon Code: LETMAR2013

<b>Location Choices (choose in order form):</b>
• Maidenhead, UK
• Miami, FL
• Los Angeles, CA

<h2>[<a href="https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=237&promocode=LETMAR2013">Order Now</a>]</h2>

These offers are only designed as a Limited time deal and will expire once stock is filled.

<h2>Network Test:</h2>

Los Angeles, CA – QuadraNet Datacenter – Test IP: 98.143.159.202
Miami, FL - QuadraNet Datacenter - Test IP: 173.44.32.20
Maidenhead, UK - Pulsant Datacenter - Test IP: 78.157.192.2

URPad.net is owned by an established parent (FTNHosting) which manages multiple web hosting brands and has been in business for 5 years. We love what we do and always appreciate your business. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us:
